subject: Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Concerned about possible demonstrations during the Beijing Games, the Chinese government produced a list of nine American athletes and one assistant coach it thought might cause problems. The State Department knew about China’s concerns and made “multiple representations” to the country’s government to reinforce the American belief in freedom of expression. USA Today reported Thursday that it had obtained an internal United States Olympic Committee e-mail message in which a Chinese official expressed concern that American team members might demonstrate.
